snippet: While Mr. de Blasio, who grew up in Massachusetts, was forced to defend his allegiance to Boston sports teams like the Red Sox, Mr. Lhota took care to highlight his local roots.
abstract: While Mr. de Blasio, who grew up in Massachusetts, was forced to defend his allegiance to Boston sports teams like the Red Sox, Mr. Lhota took care to highlight his local roots.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
